The photo was shared on Facebook: Twitter, and Instagram with a claim that it shows the Italian president crying over COVID-19.
The claim is false: as a reverse image search on Google found that the photo actually shows Brazil's president Jair Bolsonaro shedding a tear during a Thanksgiving speech in December 2019.
The misleading post was published in Dec: based news site, Poder360, with credit to Sergio Lima, one of the site's photojournalists.
A screenshot comparison of photos taken: Sergio Mattarella, further confirms the false claim.
